findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of VNLAToken
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of `VNLAToken` which is a critical aspect of the system.

findings.title: Adding duplicate pools in VNLADistribution contract
findings.description: The contract is not made to handle duplicate pools and this can result in critical malfunctions.

findings.title: Reentry attacks possible in withdraw, deposit, emergencyWithdraw and updatePool functions of VNLADistribution
findings.description: Reentry attacks are possible in `withdraw`, `deposit`, `emergencyWithdraw` and, `updatePool` functions of the `VNLADistribution`. These attacks can result in drainage of funds from the contract.
